thread.title: Samantha denies of being part of Charan's next
thread.title_full: Samantha denies of being part of Charan's next - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Samantha denies of being part of Charan's next
text:
We had already reported that Thani Oruvan, the Tamil action thriller is going to be remade in Telugu with Ram Charan. And the latest reports revealed that Samantha has been signed as the female lead. But, denying all the reports, Samantha confirmed that she is not doing the remake.
Moreover, reports suggest that the makers have decided to make a few changes to the script to suit the Telugu nativity. And it will be quite interesting to see as to who will reprise Aravind Swamy's negative role in Telugu. Stay updated on the go with Times of India News App. Click here to download it for your device.
